flawed_nl_solution:
60% of female alligators are adults because 100 - 40 = <<100-40=60>>60
There are 25 female alligators because 15 / 0.6 = <<15/0.6=52.0>>52.0
There are 50 alligators in total because 52.0 / 0.5 = <<52.0/0.5=104.0>>104.0
There are 25 male alligators because 104.0 / 2 = <<104.0/2=52.0>>52.0

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 25.0, not 52.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
